SEARCH
Package org.opencastproject.index.service.resources.list.query

Class EventListQuery

java.lang.Object
org.opencastproject.list.impl.ResourceListQueryImpl
org.opencastproject.index.service.resources.list.query.EventListQuery
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.opencastproject.list.api.ResourceListQuery
public class EventListQuery extends org.opencastproject.list.impl.ResourceListQueryImpl
Query for the events list. The following filters can be used:
  • series
  • presenters
  • presenter's usernames
  • contributors
  • location
  • agent
  • language
  • startDate
  • status
